Package uno.anahata.asi.model.tool

Class AbstractToolkit<T extends AbstractTool>

java.lang.Object
uno.anahata.asi.model.tool.AbstractToolkit<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The specific type of AbstractTool contained in this toolkit.
Direct Known Subclasses:
JavaObjectToolkit
public abstract class AbstractToolkit<T extends AbstractTool> extends Object
Represents a collection of related tools, parsed from a single Java class. This is the core domain model for a "toolkit".
Author:
anahata-gemini-pro-2.5

  • Method Details

    • getAllTools

      public abstract List<T> getAllTools()
      Gets all tools declared within this toolkit, regardless of their permission status.
      Returns:
      The complete list of tools.

    • getAllowedTools

      public List<T> getAllowedTools()
      Gets a list of tools that are allowed to be presented to the model. This filters out tools that have a permanent ToolPermission.DENY_NEVER permission and also returns an empty list if the entire toolkit is disabled.
      Returns:
      A filtered list of allowed tools.

    • getTokenCount

      public int getTokenCount()
      Calculates the total token count of this toolkit on-the-fly by aggregating the token counts of all its contained tools.
      Returns:
      The total token count for the entire toolkit.

    • setEnabled

      public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
